name: WP Post Controller
author: WordSector

sections.description:
All in one solution for posts. Get Multiple features in one place

Features

  • Post Filters: Filter the post by different custom options. such as Author, Tag, Date Range etc.
  • Post Clone: One can clone a post to a new post
  • Post Views: One can see and display post views.
  • Counter Mode: Php and Ajax.
  • Custom Post Type Views : One can select custom post types from the option to enable views.
  • Display Position: Select position on a post to show counted views to users.
  • Reset Post Views: Reset post views for all posts or Rest for a particular post to again start fresh views
  • More Features: Comming soon. Please stay tune to us.

Support

We try to give our best to solve issues on WordPress.org forums. However, One can contact us through plugin admin panel.

Bug Reports

Bug Reports are welcomed on GitHub. GitHub is not a support forum, and issues that are not properly qualified as bugs would be closed.
